comment: Smooth, spicy. Almonds and black pepper taste.
lovely sweet malt in a funky old bottle and very good value for a Japanese whiskey

Imagine Nikka from the Barrel, only quite boring, that's how I'd describe Nikka All Malts. I prefer Nikka from the Barrel and Nikka Taketsuru or even Nikka Coffey Grain which isn't one I'm crazy about.
Pas interessant, c est assez doux mais trop alcooleux, sans doute très jeune. Loin des pure malt
With water it brings out an extra sweetness. At £30 a bottle I'd have one.
Spicy vanilla nose, like getting a whiff of pure vanilla extract. Sweet on the taste but it's got a spicy bite to it on the finish. A drop or two of water helps a bit.
Oaky on the tongue, leaves a sharp warmth. The taste has vanilla or coconut tones, sweet overall. Smooth mouthfeel, creamy sensation.

Strong honey syrup. Some barley, some flowers, just a little peat.
Smokey long tail.
@otori oisterwijk. meer japanse whisky hadden ze niet :( €6.90
Lovely oaky peaty, slightly hot, crap-labelled Japanese single malt. Would drink again.
